explains: vt. 筑要塞；以要塞防守

sentences.en: Fear of terrorist attack has turned the conference centre into a fortress.
sentences.cn: 由于害怕恐怖分子袭击，会议中心已变成了堡垒。

sentences.en: It's easier to "capture the fortress from within."
sentences.cn: 堡垒更容易从内部攻破。

sentences.en: The general hastened to the relief of the fortress.
sentences.cn: 将军火速前往救援该要塞。
